parameters.query:
=
UPDATE users SET
  free_stylize = 1, free_remove_bg = 1, free_enhance = 1,
  free_reset_date = CURRENT_DATE
WHERE id = '{{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.user_id }}'
  AND (free_reset_date IS NULL OR free_reset_date < CURRENT_DATE);

SELECT COALESCE(free_enhance, 0) as free_left,
       COALESCE(star_balance, 0) as star_balance
FROM users WHERE id = '{{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.user_id }}';

=UPDATE users SET
  free_enhance = CASE WHEN free_enhance > 0 THEN free_enhance - 1 ELSE free_enhance END,
  star_balance = CASE WHEN free_enhance > 0 THEN star_balance ELSE star_balance - 8 END
WHERE id = '{{ $("Webhook").first().json.body.user_id }}';

=INSERT INTO generations (user_id, mode, result_type, result_url, prompt) VALUES ('{{ $("Webhook").first().json.body.user_id }}', 'enhance', 'image', '{{ $("Check Result").first().json.image_url }}', '')
=SELECT thread_id FROM user_topics WHERE user_id = '{{ $("Webhook").first().json.body.user_id }}' AND mode = 'enhance'

=INSERT INTO user_topics (user_id, mode, thread_id) VALUES ('{{ $("Prepare Send").first().json.user_id }}', '{{ $("Prepare Send").first().json.mode }}', {{ $("Create Topic").first().json.result.message_thread_id || $("Prepare Send").first().json.thread_id || 0 }}) ON CONFLICT (user_id, mode) DO UPDATE SET thread_id = EXCLUDED.thread_id
